title: Love in the USA Series 1-2 by Z.L. Arkadie epub
description:
Find Her, Keep Her: A Martha's Vineyard Love Story (Love in the USA #1)
Fate leads a heartbroken travel writer into the arms of her soulmate but will a secret destroy their whirlwind romance? Travel writer, Daisy Blanchard has just discovered the worst news ever. Her boyfriend is now engaged to her best friend! And to add insult to injury, she learned about the blessed event through a Facebook status update. Desperate to escape her life in shambles, Daisy takes a spur-of-the-moment assignment to Martha's Vineyard where she immediately catches the eyes of Belmont Lord, a wealthy businessman and world traveler. Thanks to Belmont's relentless pursuit, they fall hard and fast for each other. However, Belmont has a secret, which is revealed after Daisy receives an unexpected and unwelcomed visit from the last two people in the world she wants to see. Their steamy love affair comes to a grinding halt. It was the hand of fate that led him to find her but will fate also allow him keep her? This real adult contemporary romance novel. WARNING: THE LOVE AFFAIR IS HOT AND STEAMY. This story is not intended for YA readers or those who are prone to clutch their pearls! This is Daisy and Belmont's Love Story and it's racy.
There's Something About Her, A Manhattan Love Story (Love in the USA #2)
Maggie Conroy is your average city girl. She has good girlfriends, a whole lot of education and a crappy job that comes complete with the boss from hell, aka, Cruella La Bitch. Thank goodness itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not only what you know but also who you know. 
Her life turns darn near perfect when her billionaire cousin, Belmont Lord, pulls some strings, which lands her the job of her life. But thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one problem. She knows her new boss, Vincent Adams, from high school. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the one that convinced her crush and his best friend, Robert Tango, to ignore her and never act on their blossoming attraction for each other.
Now the boys are successful men and business partnersÃ¢â‚¬â€and neither will rest until he possesses Maggie for himself.
